title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: Programming Languages Implementing : Decision control structures(if, if-else, switch-statement), Loop control structures(for, while, repeat, do), Case control structures. Exercises on Functions, Arrays, Strings, Structures. Handling Pointer data.
